text: Futhiumabezabalazakanyenaweukukwenzaukuthiungenzele abahlanganyeli ekungikhonzeni lokho ongenalo ulwazi ngako ngakho-ke bobabili ungabahloniphi futhi gcina ubudlelwano obumnene nabo bobabili kulomhlaba futhi landela indlela yalowo ozisolayo kumina ngakho-ke kukumina ukuphindela kwenu bese nginitshela ngalokhu ananikwenza
